title: Disconnection fix?
body:
Since Patch 7.23 hit, I played every game at 800 ping (I play bots so it's fine), but is there any way to fix the ping? (It's not like my wifi sucks, I have an average of 40-45 ms before the preseason updates and 70 ms last patch. Is this because I have not enough storage, my wifi sucks, my computer hardwares have problem, or is it that I need to re-download my league?

Would like some help on what to do to reduce ms. Typed this post because it was so laggy that any command I issue (such as 'buy serated dirk' or 'move') would cause the client to say 'attempting to reconnect', and I was only able to flash in fountain after pressing it for like 20 times. can't buy anything, can't walk to red buff. Any fix? Should I redownload?

replies.body: I'd consider restarting your router first to make sure League is getting a clean signal to the servers, but also try running a quick repair to make sure the game files are still intact and run through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the rest of your bases.
